cms.query.QueryText:
WITH PreBuy_CTE(POSNumber) As ( select s.SKUProductCustomerReferenceNumber as POSNumber from KDA_CampaignsProduct p left join View_CMS_Tree_joined t on p.CampaignsProductID=t.DocumentForeignKeyValue left join COM_SKU s on s.SKUID=t.NodeSKUID )
select KDA_POSNumber.POSNumber from KDA_POSNumber left join PreBuy_CTE CTE on CTE.POSNumber=CAST(KDA_POSNumber.POSNumber as nvarchar(100)) where ##WHERE## order by POSNumber
